parameters.name: KeyWord
parameters.description: The keyword that you want to use to search for the application.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of records that can be returned for the query.

Valid values: 1 to 200. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that marks the position from which you want to start the query. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the beginning.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the Alibaba Cloud service name.

> For more information, see [Alibaba Cloud services that support Quota Center](~~182368~~).

parameters.name: QuotaCategory
parameters.description:
The type of the quota. Valid values:

*   CommonQuota: general quota
*   FlowControl: API rate limit
*   WhiteListLabel: whitelist quota

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the application. Valid values:

*   Disagree: rejects the application.
*   Agree: approves the application.
*   Process: reviews the application.
*   Cancel: cancels the application.
